Name: Munno Para Public Library, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon and Fri 10am-6pm, Wed and Thurs 10am-8pm, Sat 9am-12pm; closed Tues and public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans. Referral to paid researchers is available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required from family historians.

About.Acquisition focus: To develop and maintain a comprehensive local history collection.

About.Major holdings: Local History Collection: Published works, pamphlets/leaflets, newspapers, audio and video tapes, photographs, miscellaneous copied material, maps, art works, microforms, artefacts.
